overview: As a result of a forbidden relationship between Tatiana and the Prime Minister of England, Khaos Clifford means the possibility of a scandal and the end of Mitchell Clifford’s political career in 1992.  Lana is an addict mother, looking for the Prime Minister to blackmail him in exchange for money. Khaos, though free, finds himself trapped in his own mind, facing a psychological battle where he tirelessly seeks to find his purpose in the world. Drugs use and alcohol become Khaos's pastime, until his personal life begins to interfere with work.  Khaos is recruited to infiltrate one of the largest human trafficking schemes in Europe.  Khaos will then face everything he has fought to get rid of in recent years, drugs, parties and alcohol. Infiltrated in the gang, Khaos will have to be strong to stand firm and not yield abstinence, struggling to maintain his balance and sanity.
tagline: After being kidnapped and held captive for 10 years, young Khaos escapes and finds himself under the care of psychologist Sarah. Years later, Khaos becomes an MI6 secret agent, infiltrating one of the largest human trafficking networks in Europe.
title: Operation: Khaos
